item.title: Sample blog post to learn markdown tips
item.description: There's lots to learn! - This is a demo post to show you how to write blog posts with markdown. I strongly encourage you to take 5 minutes to learn how to write in markdown - itâ€™ll teach you how to transform regular text into bold/italics/tables/etc.I also encourage you to look at the code that created this post to learn some more advanced tips about...

item.title: Camino Frances | Oct and Nov 2018
item.description: Walking the Camino - Adventure #2. Walk from St. Jean Pied de Port in France to Santiago de Compostella in Spain. I started by myself in October. During the first 2 weeks we assembled a merry crew of pilgrims. For the last 2 weeks, it was a more solitary walk, occasionally shared with new friends for a day or two. I documented the trip...
